title: Strengthening Healthcare Practice Competencies: Coaching Culture Design and Implementation Strategies Within Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Organizational Development (OD) core concepts and intermediate domain expertise (in science)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core elements for designing a coaching culture within an organization (leadership motivation, relationship-building, role modeling).
Learners can analyze real-world cases to develop strategies for implementing a coaching culture and execute them using a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) approach.
Learners can utilize science-based approaches to develop customized coaching models for organizations and measure performance metrics.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
